meanings.definition: The study of the iris as an indicator of health and disease.
meanings.sent1: Iridology helps doctors understand a person's health by looking at the iris.
meanings.sent2: Many alternative medicine practitioners use iridology to assess their patients' well-being.
meanings.sent3: During the iridology session, the iris seemed to reveal all the secrets of the body.
meanings.sent4: Her expertise in iridology allowed her to see beyond what meets the eye.
meanings.sent5: The concept of iridology is like a window into the body's inner workings.

meanings.definition: The practice of diagnosing health conditions based on the appearance of the iris.
meanings.sent1: Iridology can sometimes detect health issues before they become serious.
meanings.sent2: The iridology report indicated potential concerns that needed further investigation.
meanings.sent3: The detective jokingly referred to his investigation technique as 'iris iridology'.
meanings.sent4: Her accuracy in iridology was as sharp as a hawk's vision.
meanings.sent5: The art of iridology is like deciphering a coded message written in the iris.
